attributes.action: Sack Keith Vaz, or at least get him to pay back £75,000 for a flat 12 miles from home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keith Vaz’s lack of remorse for his greedy antics is shameful. The man has abused the position of a parliamentary public servant and facilitated material consumption at the expense of tax payer’s money. Mr. Vaz has claimed more than £75,500 in expenses for a flat in Westminster despite his family home being a £1.15 million house just 12 miles from parliament. Furthermore, he has not stated he is willing to pay back the money for superflous luxary items bought on expenses. He needs to go.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
